product_name: Marin Ravenna A6 WFG Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: With a smooth carbon fork and a quality Shimano drivetrain, the Marin Ravenna A6 WFG women's bike offers a speedy introduction to road cycling without the discomfort of a race-oriented frame. Frame geometry is designed specifically for women, promoting comfort and efficiency. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame sets you up for an efficient, stable ride. Shimano Claris Compact crankset powers the 8-speed cassette for 16 gear combinations. Shimano Claris shifters and derailleurs work together effortlessly for responsive shifts. Dual-pivot caliper brakes supply dependable speed management. Formula hubs and speedy Schwalbe Lugano tires keep you rolling smoothly and efficiently. Platform pedals don't require special cycling shoes. Specs on the Marin Ravenna A6 WFG women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: With a smooth carbon fork and a quality Shimano drivetrain, the Marin Ravenna A6 WFG women's bike offers a speedy introduction to road cycling without the discomfort of a race-oriented frame.
